properties.title: Colorado DUI Lawyer talks about Opening Statements in a DUI Trial
properties.description: The opening statement is your attorney’s first opportunity to discuss the case with the jury. In the opening statement, the attorney will have the opportunity to explain your theory to the jury from the perspective of what the facts will show. Before your attorney gives his opening statement, the prosecutor will have the opportunity to Continue ReadingColorado DUI Lawyer talks about Opening Statements in a DUI Trial is a post from: Mountain Legal - Denver Colorado Criminal Defense

properties.title: Colorado DUI Lawyer talks about selecting a jury for your case
properties.description: Selecting a Jury A Colorado DUI trial typically begins with jury selection. This is the process where you pick the people that will decide your case. Jury selection begins by a group of individuals being called into the courtroom.  When the people are seated in the courtroom, the judge will explain to them that some Continue ReadingColorado DUI Lawyer talks about selecting a jury for your case is a post from: Mountain Legal - Denver Colorado Criminal Defense

properties.title: Pre-Trial Motions in a Colorado DUI Case
properties.description: Once you decide that you want to go to trial, you will receive two court dates. The first court date will be a motions hearing. The second court date will be the date of the trial. In some courts, the motions hearing will be set on the same day as the trial. In other courts, Continue ReadingPre-Trial Motions in a Colorado DUI Case is a post from: Mountain Legal - Denver Colorado Criminal Defense

properties.title: An Overview of the Colorado DUI Trial Process
properties.description: Before you decide whether you want to take a plea or go to trial, you need to be informed of the strengths and weaknesses of your case.  In order for your Colorado DUI Attorney to properly inform you, he must prepare your case for trial. This series discusses the process of preparing a DUI for Continue ReadingAn Overview of the Colorado DUI Trial Process is a post from: Mountain Legal - Denver Colorado Criminal Defense

properties.title: How long will your license be Revoked for a Colorado DUI and What You Can Do About It
properties.description: If you lose your Administrative License Revocation Hearing, you will lose your privilege to drive.  The number of DUIs and DWAIs that you have in your past and the frequency of your priors will determine how long your license will be revoked.  The following table shows the typical revocation periods that you should expect to Continue ReadingHow long will your license be Revoked for a Colorado DUI and What You Can Do About It is a post from: Mountain Legal - Denver Colorado Criminal Defense

properties.title: What Happens at a License Revocation Hearing for a Colorado DUI
properties.description: Colorado DUI Administrative License Revocation Hearing Overview: The Administrative hearing is a mini-trial where an administrative officer will decide whether you get to keep your driver’s license.  At this hearing, evidence will be presented against you concerning your alleged DUI.  After hearing all of the evidence, the hearing officer will decide whether you were driving Continue ReadingWhat Happens at a License Revocation Hearing for a Colorado DUI is a post from: Mountain Legal - Denver Colorado Criminal Defense
